responsibilities: Assisted in the preparation of statutory and GAAP financial reporting for life insurance product lines.
Utilized SQL and Python to extract and manipulate large datasets for mortality and morbidity trend analysis.
Performed quarterly reserve calculations and reconciled differences in valuation results.
Contributed to the automation of monthly reporting templates using VBA, reducing processing time by 15%.
Supported the personal lines pricing team by conducting sensitivity analysis on premium rate changes.
Developed a data validation tool in Excel to identify outliers in claims data, improving data integrity for modeling.
Presented a competitive landscape analysis to senior leadership, focusing on emerging auto insurance trends.
Assisted with documentation for state regulatory filings to ensure compliance with actuarial standards of practice.
